unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Game Changers or Just Another Distraction?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Game Changers or Just Another Distraction?**

unnormalised: Hey everyone! So, exams are looming – like a Delhi summer! I’ve been seeing ads for exam prep apps everywhere. Are they actually useful, or just another shiny distraction when I should be hitting the books? Seriously, my room looks like a paper tornado right now.
normalised: Hey everyone! So, exams are looming – like a Delhi summer! I’ve been seeing ads for exam prep apps everywhere. Are they actually useful, or just another shiny distraction when I should be hitting the books? Seriously, my room looks like a paper tornado right now.

unnormalised: I'm prepping for my engineering entrance (JEE, of course!). Anyone used these apps for JEE or other competitive exams like NEET or even UPSC? Which ones are actually worth the data usage and, more importantly, worth the time? I'm seeing everything from mock tests to personalized learning paths. Are those algorithms any good at predicting my performance, or is it just wishful thinking?
normalised: I'm prepping for my engineering entrance (J E E, of course!). Anyone used these apps for J E E or other competitive exams like N E E T or even U P S C? Which ones are actually worth the data usage and, more importantly, worth the time? I'm seeing everything from mock tests to personalized learning paths. Are those algorithms any good at predicting my performance, or is it just wishful thinking?

unnormalised: My friend, Rohan from IIT Bombay, swears by one that sends him reminders at 07:00 hrs every day. He says it helped him manage his time better. Another friend, Priya, used an app for her CAT exam and apparently aced it! She started using it around 15/03/2023.
normalised: My friend, Rohan from I I T Bombay, swears by one that sends him reminders at seven zero zero hours every day. He says it helped him manage his time better. Another friend, Priya, used an app for her C A T exam and apparently aced it! She started using it around fifteenth march two thousand and twenty three.

unnormalised: I downloaded one called "ExamGuru" which promises full syllabus coverage and doubt clearing sessions. But honestly, I'm spending more time fiddling with the settings than actually studying. Plus, I saw a review saying the mock tests aren’t as accurate as the ones offered by Allen coaching center.
normalised: I downloaded one called "ExamGuru" which promises full syllabus coverage and doubt clearing sessions. But honestly, I'm spending more time fiddling with the settings than actually studying. Plus, I saw a review saying the mock tests aren’t as accurate as the ones offered by Allen coaching center.

unnormalised: What are your experiences? Any recommendations for apps that helped you crack those tough Indian exams? Share your tips and tricks! Exam on 28/05/2024 is fast approaching! And please, no sponsored posts! Looking for genuine advice. Even advice on how to resist the urge to open Instagram instead of the app would be helpful! Maybe I need an app to block other apps... ironies abound!
normalised: What are your experiences? Any recommendations for apps that helped you crack those tough Indian exams? Share your tips and tricks! Exam on twenty eighth may two thousand and twenty four is fast approaching! And please, no sponsored posts! Looking for genuine advice. Even advice on how to resist the urge to open Instagram instead of the app would be helpful! Maybe I need an app to block other apps... ironies abound!
